channel.title: Medynaes Games Blog on Medynaes
channel.description: Recent content in Medynaes Games Blog on Medynaes

item.title: After some time.
item.description: After little bit brake. Hi. I was away little bit, but I’m back. Now i’m working on Just 2048 and Space miner tycoon AND staring to make my steam game.

item.title: IMBACKENDER
item.description: Making games Connected(!) Im trying to make my own currency for all MEDYNAES games. Players can gain Medynaesium on every games and spend on every games.

item.title: Working On Space Miner Tycoon
item.description: This game looking familiar(!) Yea i like boring games. now I Like making them too. Space Miner Tycoon is a strategy game, basic purpose is the improve your stats to be a better miner.
